entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9 except minus 14 north of Terrenceville.
entry.summary: Cloudy except clear north of Terrenceville overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light before morning. Low minus 9 except minus 14 north of Terrenceville. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
